summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing transportation charges incurred by Jeffrey Epstein & Co. Inc. for services rendered on May 14, 1999. The invoice includes information about the sender, recipient, and payment details, indicating a rebilling of charges to Epstein's account.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the sender of the package sent via FedEx, with an address in Cambridge, MA.

persons.name: Elizabeth Ross Johnson
persons.context: Elizabeth Ross Johnson is identified as the recipient of the package sent to Trump International Hotel in New York.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein sent a package to Elizabeth Ross Johnson at Trump International Hotel.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx from Jeffrey Epstein's address.

events.title: Invoice Issued
events.description: An invoice was issued for transportation charges related to a package sent by Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Harvard University, Oxford St, Cambridge, MA 02138-2901
Trump International Hotel, One Central Park W, Penthouse 5, New York, NY 10023
keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 14, 1999, and details transportation charges of $13.72.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the sender with an address in Cambridge, MA.
Elizabeth Ross Johnson is identified as the recipient at Trump International Hotel in New York.
The invoice indicates that the charges were initially billed to a different payor and are now being rebilled to Epstein's account.
The package was picked up on April 14, 1999.
